span.span: Represents a 16-bit signed integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值类型表示有符号的整数值范围从负的 32768 到正的 32767 之间。The value type represents signed integers with values ranging from negative 32768 through positive 32767. 此类型提供了将此类型的实例的值转换为其字符串表示形式，将数字的字符串表示形式转换为此类型的实例并将此类型的实例进行比较的方法。This type provides methods to convert the value of an instance of this type to its string representation, to convert the string representation of a number to an instance of this type, and to compare instances of this type. 您还可以调用的成员类来执行各种数值操作，包括获得某个数字的商和整数除法运算的余数计算确定两个最大或最小值的绝对值整数，获取数字的符号和舍入数字。You can also call the members of the class to perform a wide range of numeric operations, including getting the absolute value of a number, calculating the quotient and remainder from integral division, determining the maximum or minimum value of two integers, getting the sign of a number, and rounding a number. 格式规范代码如何控制值类型的字符串表示形式的信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For information about how format specification codes control the string representation of value types, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).

threadsafe.span: 作为使用任何其他类型，读取和写入对共享变量包含此类型的实例必须受到使用锁来确保线程安全性。

span.span: As with any other type, reading and writing to a shared variable that contains an instance of this type must be protected by a lock to guarantee thread safety.

Microsoft C# 编译器将生成表示形式的参数值的说明对象，然后生成比较的值的方法实例和参数表示形式。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an object, then generates a method that compares the values of the instance and the parameter representation. 请查阅您的编程语言的文档以确定其编译器是否对数值类型执行隐式扩大转换。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了泛型和非泛型版本的多个值和引用类型的方法。The following code example demonstrates generic and nongeneric versions of the method for several value and reference types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式默认值 （"G"或常规） 中的值使用的格式当前区域性的对象。The method formats an value in the default ("G", or general) format by using the object of the current culture. 如果你想要指定不同的格式或区域性，使用的其他重载方法，按如下所示：If you want to specify a different format or culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|特定区域性A specific culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来显示数组值到控制台。The following example uses the method to display an array of values to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式默认值 （"G"或常规） 中的值使用的格式指定区域性的对象。The method formats an value in the default ("G", or general) format by using the object of a specified culture. 如果你想要指定不同的格式或当前区域性，使用的其他重载方法，按如下所示：If you want to specify a different format or the current culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). `provider`参数是实现其方法将返回对象。The `provider` parameter is an implementation whose method returns a object. 通常情况下，`provider`是对象或对象。Typically, `provider` is a object or a object. 对象提供了此方法返回的字符串的格式特定于区域性的信息。The object provides culture-specific information about the format of the string returned by this method. 如果`provider`是`null`，此实例进行格式设置与为当前区域性的对象。If `provider` is `null`, this instance is formatted with the object for the current culture. ## Examples 下面的示例循环访问数组值，并向控制台显示每个通过调用使用不同的格式提供程序的方法。The following example iterates an array of values and displays each of them to the console by calling the method with different format providers. 由于简单定义的格式设置的默认"G"格式说明符，每个生成的格式的字符串值是相同的值无关`provider`参数。Because of the simple formatting defined by the default "G" format specifier, the formatted strings produced for each value are identical regardless of the value of the `provider` parameter. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式通过使用指定的格式值对象，表示当前区域性的约定。The method formats an value in a specified format by using a object that represents the conventions of the current culture. 如果想要使用默认值 （"G"或常规） 格式或指定不同的区域性，请使用的其他重载方法，按如下所示：If you want to use the default ("G", or general) format or specify a different culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|特定区域性A specific culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| `format`参数可以是一个标准或自定义数字格式字符串。The `format` parameter can be either a standard or a custom numeric format string. 支持"R"（或"r"） 以外的所有标准数字格式字符串，因为所有自定义数字格式字符。All standard numeric format strings other than "R" (or "r") are supported, as are all custom numeric format characters. 如果`format`是`null`或空字符串，此实例的返回值格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G")。If `format` is `null` or an empty string, the return value of this instance is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 此实例返回值进行格式设置为当前区域性。The return value of this instance is formatted with the for the current culture. ## Examples 下面的示例初始化两个值，并将其显示在控制台中使用每个受支持的标准格式字符串和多个自定义格式字符串。The following example initializes two values and displays them to the console using each of the supported standard format strings and several custom format strings. 运行该示例，是 EN-US 作为当前区域性。The example is run with en-US as the current culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不同于方法通过返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否分析操作成功而不是返回的已分析值。The method differs from the method by returning a Boolean value that indicates whether the parse operation succeeded instead of returning the parsed value. 它消除了需要使用异常处理来测试的事件中`s`无效，不能成功分析。It eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a in the event that `s` is invalid and cannot be successfully parsed. `s`参数应为窗体的数字的字符串表示形式：The `s` parameter should be the string representation of a number in the form: [ws][sign]digits[ws][ws][sign]digits[ws] 在方括号 （[和]） 是可选的项。Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表对每个元素进行了描述。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|可选的空白区域。Optional white space.| |*sign**sign*|一个可选符号后。An optional sign.| |*digits**digits*|范围从 0 到 9 的数字的序列。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.| `s`参数被解释使用样式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 除了十进制数字，允许仅前导空格和尾随空格以及前导符号。In addition to the decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. 若要显式定义的样式元素以及可出现在特定于区域性的格式设置信息`s`，使用方法。To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the method. `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数对象，将初始化为当前系统区域性。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object that is initialized for the current system culture. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 此重载方法中的所有数字都解释`s`为十进制数字的参数。This overload of the method interprets all digits in the `s` parameter as decimal digits. 若要分析的十六进制数字的字符串表示形式，请调用重载。To parse the string representation of a hexadecimal number, call the overload. ## Examples 下面的示例调用使用大量不同的字符串值的方法。The following example calls the method with a number of different string values. [!code-csharp[System.Int16.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int16.TryParse/cs/TryParse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int16.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int16.TryParse/vb/TryParse1.vb#1)] 一些字符串，方法不能进行转换在此示例是：Some of the strings that the method is unable to convert in this example are: - "9432.0"."9432.0". 转换失败，因为该字符串不能包含十进制分隔符，则它必须包含仅整数位。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a decimal separator; it must contain integral digits only. - "16,667"."16,667". 转换失败，因为该字符串不能包含组分隔符，则为它必须包含仅整数位。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain group separators; it must contain integral digits only. - "(100)"."(100)". 转换失败，因为该字符串不能包含不是由当前区域性定义负号和属性。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a negative sign other than the one defined by the current culture's and properties. - "01FA"。"01FA". 转换失败，因为该字符串不能包含十六进制数字;它必须包含仅为十进制数字。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain hexadecimal digits; it must contain decimal digits only.
